issues.title: Set up CI/CD pipeline
issues.description: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing and deployment using GitHub Actions. This should include unit tests, integration tests, and automatic deployment to staging.

issues.title: ETL process failure handling
issues.description: Fix issue where the ETL process crashes during high-volume data loads. This includes setting up a retry mechanism for failed jobs and logging detailed error reports.

issues.title: Optimize SQL queries for dashboard generation
issues.description: Optimize slow-running SQL queries used for generating dashboard metrics. This includes adding indexes, refactoring joins, and caching frequent query results.

issues.title: Data pipeline error alert system
issues.description: Set up an alerting system for data pipeline errors, including Slack notifications and email alerts. Alerts should trigger on pipeline failures and unexpected delays.

issues.title: Create transformation logic for ETL pipeline
issues.description: Write transformation logic to clean and normalize raw sales data in the ETL pipeline. Ensure the transformation adheres to the schema required for further analysis.
